UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Refining the eosinophil cationic protein antibacterial pharmacophore by rational structure minimization.
Literature.Author: Torrent M, Pulido D, de la Torre BG, García-Mayoral MF, Nogués MV, Bruix M, Andreu D, Boix E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL2(MIC=>10µM),Pseudomonas sp. ATCC 15915(MIC=>10µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 15308(MIC=>10µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 502A(MIC=>10µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 7468(MIC=>10µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=>10µM)
